    Methods in game.ActorObj with parameters of type Display 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Action Agilisaurus.playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)  
    Action Allosaur.playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
    same as any dinosaur except allosaur can eat the dead stegasour if it finds one
    Action Dinosaur.playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
    Actions of what the dinosaur will do for next turn foodlevel will be decremented and a warning will be printed out when it reaches 20 or below, at 0 foodlevel, the dinosaur will become unconscious in 20 turns if no food is eaten/fed
    Action Player.playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
    function for checking objects that can interact with the player
    Action Stegosaur.playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
    Stegasour will have a foodlevel where it decrements by 1 every turn, sends out an alert when foodlevel drops below 20, and sent into an unconscious state when it drops to 0, if stegasour has no health, it dies and becomes a dead stegasour where allosaur can eat it
